beer.name: Rooster Cream Ale
beer.description: ThisÂ American-style cream ale is one of the smoothest beers ever made here at Deschutes Brewery!Â The grist bill consists of pale malt, honey malt, flaked barley,Â MunichÂ malt, and oats.Â Â The fruity aroma is imparted by Sterling and Crystal hops.Â Beware of this beer, you might find yourself coming back for another over and over again...
